mapper.select: SELECT product_no AS productNo, product_brand AS productBrand, product_name AS productName, product_img AS productImg, stock AS stock, TO_CHAR(receive_dt, 'YYYY . MM . DD') AS receiveDt, receive_loc AS receiveLoc FROM product where receive_dt >= SYSDATE
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO product_history(product_history_no, member_no, product_no, product_history_dt, product_status) VALUES (product_history_seq.NEXTVAL, #{memberNo}, #{productNo}, SYSDATE, 'false')
mapper.select: SELECT product_history_no AS productHistoryNo, product_no AS productNo, member_no AS memberNo, product_history_dt, product_status AS productStatus FROM product_history WHERE product_status = 'false' AND member_no = #{memberNo}

SELECT product_no AS productNo, product_brand AS productBrand, product_name AS productName, product_img AS productImg, stock AS stock, receive_dt AS receiveDt, receive_loc AS receiveLoc FROM product WHERE product_no = #{productNo}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT rownum rnum, B.* FROM ( SELECT product_history_no AS productHistoryNo, member_no AS memberNo, product_no AS productNo, product_history_dt AS productHistoryDt, CASE WHEN product_status = 'true' THEN '수령 완료' WHEN product_status = 'false' THEN '미수령' WHEN product_status = 'cancel' THEN '신청 취소' ELSE '기타 상태' END AS productStatus FROM product_history ORDER BY product_history_dt DESC ) B WHERE rownum <= #{page} * #{amount} ) WHERE rnum > (#{page} - 1) * #{amount}

select count(product_history_no) from product_history where
product_history_no > 0

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT rownum rnum, B.* FROM ( SELECT product_history_no AS productHistoryNo, member_no AS memberNo, product_no AS productNo, product_history_dt AS productHistoryDt, CASE WHEN product_status = 'true' THEN '수령 완료' ELSE '기타 상태' END AS productStatus FROM product_history WHERE product_status = 'true' ORDER BY product_history_dt DESC ) B WHERE rownum <= #{page} * #{amount} ) WHERE rnum > (#{page} - 1) * #{amount}

WITH all_dates AS ( SELECT TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'MM') + LEVEL - 1 AS all_dates FROM DUAL CONNECT BY LEVEL <= TRUNC(SYSDATE) - TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'MM') + 1 ) SELECT TO_CHAR(ad.all_dates, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS productHistoryDt, COUNT(ph.product_history_no) AS dailyProductCount FROM all_dates ad LEFT JOIN product_history ph ON TO_CHAR(ph.product_history_dt, 'YYYY-MM-DD') = TO_CHAR(ad.all_dates, 'YYYY-MM-DD') WHERE (ph.product_status = 'true' OR ph.product_status IS NULL) GROUP BY TO_CHAR(ad.all_dates, 'YYYY-MM-DD') ORDER BY TO_CHAR(ad.all_dates, 'YYYY-MM-DD') ASC

SELECT cumulativeProductCount FROM ( SELECT productHistoryDt, dailyProductCount, SUM(dailyProductCount) OVER (ORDER BY TO_DATE(productHistoryDt, 'YYYY-MM-DD')) AS cumulativeProductCount, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY TO_DATE(productHistoryDt, 'YYYY-MM-DD') DESC) AS row_num FROM ( SELECT TO_CHAR(product_history_dt, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS productHistoryDt, COUNT(product_history_no) AS dailyProductCount FROM product_history WHERE product_status = 'true' AND TO_CHAR(product_history_dt, 'YYYY-MM') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM') GROUP BY TO_CHAR(product_history_dt, 'YYYY-MM-DD') ) subquery ) final_query WHERE row_num = 1
